Special: SM Wep, Flame

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Flamer of the Salamanders. Targets set on fire by this weapon must also make a -20 Willpower Test, if failed they roll on the Shock Table as if they had just failed a Fear Test. Those set on fire by Astartes flamer weapons take +4 damage from the flames.
